attributes.additional_details:
We are all parents that have had enough of the rise in child sexual abuse and the lenient sentences handed out by the courts as the European Court of Justice are handing out light sentences.

Our children have the right to lead an innocent life and not to be scarred and damaged by these vile evil excuses for humans that think its okay to ruin their lives never mind just their childhoods.
attributes.background: Sentences for PAEDOPHILES  are too weak
